hero.title:

hero.description: Specializing in the production and sales of drill tail (self-tapping) screw molds, combination molds, and more, providing you with high-quality precision mold solutions. Pursuing excellence and creating greater value for customers.

company.title:
Zhonglianda
Precision Mold
company.subtitle: Leading enterprise specializing in drill tail (self-tapping) screw mold manufacturing
company.description1: Zhonglianda Mold Co., Ltd. is a professional manufacturer of drill tail (self-tapping) screw molds. Our products cover drill tail (self-tapping) screw molds required for ordinary carbon steel, stainless steel, and composite screws, helping the industry cope with high-technical difficulty drill tail (self-tapping) screw production.
company.description2: The company has extensive industry experience and has continuously gained industry recognition, being designated as the drill tail (self-tapping) screw mold supplier for many customers.
company.description3: Currently, Zhonglianda Mold has established a large-scale cooperation foundation in the Chinese mainland market and actively expands into high-demand markets such as Europe, America, and Asia, promoting China's high-quality drill tail (self-tapping) screw molds to the world.

sponsors.title: Product Showcase
sponsors.description: Zhonglianda precision mold product series, specializing in MB and MC series drill tail (self-tapping) screw molds to meet different customer needs.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Dongguan Zhonglianda Precision Mold Co., Ltd. - Professional Drill Tail (Self-Tapping) Screw Mold Manufacturer
about.profileDescription1: Founded in 2019, Dongguan Zhonglianda Precision Mold Co., Ltd. has 6 years of development experience. The company specializes in the production and sales of drill tail (self-tapping) screw molds, and has grown into a medium-sized enterprise in the industry with advanced equipment and professional technical teams.
about.profileDescription2: The company's founder, Mr. Liu, has over 20 years of industry experience, leading the team to continuously innovate and strive for excellence. We have established stable cooperative relationships with many well-known screw manufacturers in the industry, always adhering to quality as the core and service as the orientation, continuously improving product performance, and has won wide recognition and trust from customers.

experience.title: Rich Experience
experience.description: The founder has over 20 years of industry experience, deeply understanding market needs and technological development trends.

quality.title: Quality Assurance
quality.description: Strict quality control system ensures that every product meets industry standards and customer requirements.

innovation.title: Technical Innovation
innovation.description: Continuous investment in R&D, constantly optimizing production processes to improve product performance and competitiveness.

team.title: Professional Team
team.description: Experienced technical team providing professional technical support and solutions for customers.

price.title: Competitive Pricing
price.description: Providing competitive price solutions for customers based on large-scale production advantages.

trust.title: Customer Trust
trust.description: Established long-term cooperative relationships with many well-known screw manufacturers, winning wide recognition and trust from customers.
